document_data.name: Cloudtop Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''Cloudtop Tower''' was a tower in the [[elf]] city of [[Evereska]]. It was home to the [[Elven high mage|High Magi]] of the [[Cloudtop Magi Circle]], advisers to the [[Hill Elders|Council of Hill Elders]] and commanders of the [[Spellguard (Evereska)|Spellguard]].<ref>
document_data.History: It played a crucial role in the initital skirmishes between the elves of Evereska and the malevolent [[phaerimm]] that broke out in the {{YearlinkName|1371}}. The high mages of Cloudtop [[divination|divined]] information about the movements of the phaerimm, granting insight to the elves on the ground, such as those led by [[Zharilee]].
